history.empty: There's no history information to display yet.
history.title: History

notice.description: You can login using your Twitch account. This will allow to send a message on your chat with both teams' members and Pokémon, create a prediction about who will win a match and finish it. Check our privacy policy to know how will your data be used. You can hide this message by clicking on it.

playerlist.announcement-details: Send an announcement on your channel's chat with the players and Pokémon in each team.
playerlist.details-input: You can add players by asking them to use your command or manually typing the names and presssing Enter.
playerlist.details-swap: You can drag and drop players to swap their positions.
playerlist.reload-details: Is the player list acting weird? Try to reload the list to fix it.
playerlist.remove-on-rotate: Remove players when rotating a team instead of shuffling them into the waitlist.
playerlist.streamer-mode: Streamer mode: Always keep the first player of the first team when rotating players.
playerlist.title: Players

strategies.all-roles: Guarantee all roles in both teams.
strategies.global-unique-pokemon: Don't repeat Pokémon between both teams.

twitch.bot-details: Some replies may be sent by TheMimeJr, a bot account. Depending on your channel's restrictions, it may not be able to send messages.
twitch.details: If you connect to your chat, your viewers will be able to join using your command, e.g. !queue. !list command has a 5 seconds cooldown.
twitch.list-no-players: There are no players in the waitlist.
twitch.message-pos: $1, your position in the waitlist is: $2.
twitch.message-pos-none: $1, you are not in the waitlist. Have you used the command to join?
twitch.message-pos-now: $1, you're in the current match, you can enter the room now!
